author: arkurth
msg: Added enable_user subroutine to Vista.pm. This gets called by grant_access. When access is granted, it makes sure the user account is enabled. This resolves the problem that occurs if the Administrator account is disabled for an imaging resquest.

author: bjreed
msg: GeronimoServerPluginManager updated to account for small differences in PluginInstaller between 2.1.4 and 2.2
